name: Entradas Predefinidas
author: Pablo Moratinos

sections.description:
This plugin helps you creating a post template that you will reuse in all your new posts to include some text, shortcode or html.
It’ s very useful when your authors must to use always the same text or code in theirs post.
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

  1. Upload the entire entradas-predefinidas folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress
  3. Use the Entradas Predefinidas screen to add your post template
sections.faq:
Could I use html o shortcodes?

Yes you could. This plugin works with text, html code or shortcodes

What happens if I edit a published post?

Nothing. The defined text only applies to new posts.
sections.changelog:
1.0.0 (february 20, 2018)

  • First Release. This is the first release of my plugin.

short_description: Create a post template to add predefined content for your authors
description:
This plugin helps you creating a post template that you will reuse in all your new posts to include some text, shortcode or html.
It’ s very useful when your authors must to use always the same text or code in theirs post.

screenshots.caption: Define the text, html or shortcode that you need to add to your future new posts.
When you add a new post the predefined text it will be added
